hero.name: I'm Adel Shabayek
hero.title: Front-End Developer | Angular CLI | Building Responsive & Scalable Web UI

about.title: Turning complex problems into simple design
about.description1: Hi, I’m Adel Shabayek, a dedicated Front-End Developer specializing in Angular and modern web technologies. I build dynamic, high-performance, and scalable web applications using Angular, TypeScript, PrimeNG, and Bootstrap.
about.description2: With a strong eye for design and deep technical expertise, I craft responsive, accessible, and visually polished interfaces that deliver seamless user experiences. Passionate about clean architecture and performance optimization, I transform complex requirements into elegant, maintainable digital solutions.
about.description3: Passionate about clean architecture and performance optimization, I transform complex requirements into elegant, maintainable digital solutions.
about.name: Adel Shabayek
about.quote: "Code is not just about syntax — it’s about storytelling and precision."

resume.title: Resume
resume.text: Throughout my career, I’ve combined academic knowledge with hands-on experience to build a strong foundation in both design and development. My educational background has equipped me with essential technical and creative skills, while my professional journey — working with companies, teams, and clients across different regions — has refined my ability to deliver practical, real-world solutions.

experiences.title: Front-End Developer
details: Built interactive dashboards and dynamic forms using Angular 17+, Angular Material, and PrimeNG.
Developed reusable components and optimized UI performance.
Integrated REST APIs and managed data with RxJS and Reactive Forms.

experiences.title: Front-End Developer
details: Designed a seamless, interactive user interface using HTML, CSS, and TypeScript.
Delivered responsive design for a flawless experience across all devices.
Enhanced UI/UX through performance optimization and modern layout techniques.

education.degree: B.A. in English Language and Literature

projects.title: Sales Director Portfolio
projects.description: A modern personal portfolio built with Angular 17, PrimeNG, and Bootstrap for a sales director. Features responsive design, smooth animations, and dark/light mode.

projects.title: Fact Café
description: Designed with modern HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, offering a seamless, interactive interface.
Built a categorized menu for easy exploration of drinks and desserts.
Fully responsive design across all devices.

projects.title: English Teacher
description: Developed an interactive website for lesson booking and communication.
Modern, responsive design with high performance.

projects.title: Acadez Platform
description: Built a multilingual online learning platform (Arabic & English).
Integrated smart search and student-teacher communication features.

projects.title: Elbiek Grilles
description: Developed a smooth bilingual restaurant website.
Integrated Microsoft Form for customer feedback.

projects.title: Arish University
description: Built systems for university management using Vue.js, TypeScript, and Bootstrap5.
Collaborated with a development team to meet project deadlines.

testimonials.name: Ahmed Kamal
testimonials.feedback: عادل مطوّر شغوف ومبدع. دايمًا يقدّم حلول دقيقة وسريعة، وكوده نظيف جدًا، يراعي أدق تفاصيل تجربة المستخدم. فعلاً يعرف كيف يحوّل أي فكرة إلى واجهة أنيقة وسلسة.

testimonials.name: Mosafa Mohamed
testimonials.feedback: تعاملنا مع عادل في أكثر من مشروع، وكان دايمًا على قدر المسؤولية. محترف في التنظيم، ملتزم بالمواعيد، ويملك حس تصميم راقٍ جدًا. النتيجة كانت موقع استثنائي بأداء رائع.

testimonials.name: Fares Khalel
testimonials.feedback: شغلي مع عادل كان ممتع بكل معنى الكلمة! شخص متعاون جدًا ويفهم بسرعة المطلوب، عنده ذوق عالي في التفاصيل ومهارة فنية تخليه يوازن بين الجمال والأداء بسلاسة.

testimonials.name: Saud Al-Otaibi
testimonials.feedback: بصراحة عادل من أصدق وأكفأ الناس اللي تعاملت معهم، فاهم شغله زين وما يسلّم إلا وهو راضي 100%. الله يوفقه، شغله يشرف.

testimonials.name: Khalid Al-Mansoori
testimonials.feedback: عادل شخص شغوف ومخلص في شغله، تعرف من أول تعامل إن عنده فكر ومهارة. تسلّمه المشروع وتكون مرتاح، لأنه يسوي كل شي على أكمل وجه.
